summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting deeds for street purposes and storm drain easements, all in Lindsley's Mineral Springs Plat, a portion of the East Half of Section 19, Township 26 North Range 4 East, W.M., and a portion of the Southeast Quarter of Section 34, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., laying off North Northgate Way and North 135th Street and assigning jurisdiction thereof. (RW 8661, RW 8684 and RW 8814).
